org.sindice.siren.demo

Class SimpleSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sindice.siren.demo.SimpleSearcher

  • public class SimpleSearcher
extends Object
    This class shows how to use the SIREn's parsers to search over JSON data.

    There is no specific configuration required for searching over fields indexed with the SIREn's posting format.
